Elixir of Love
Shifnal, Shropshire Brass Band News Sept 1894 shows Rose Hill (Conductor J.Bedford) instead of Willenhall Temperance. March contest: 1. Willenhall, 2. Silverdale, 3. Wednesbury Prizes - 1st £15, 2nd £7.10s., 3rd £3,10s. 5 bands competed
April 11, 2012, 5:20 p.m. June 14, 2019, 9:26 a.m.
1 Wednesbury Temperance Richard Sourbutts
2 St. George's Old James Bedford
3 Silverdale Town George Turner
3 Willenhall Silver James Roberts
Unknown Result Shifnal Volunteers F. Morris
